title: Defining Terraform's Path Forward

stakeholderVoices.name: Board Chair
stakeholderVoices.quote: We avoided disruption. Now we need a clearer direction.

stakeholderVoices.name: CFO
stakeholderVoices.quote: We can fund a strategy—but not multiple strategies at once.

stakeholderVoices.name: Head of Engineering
stakeholderVoices.quote: Competitors are accelerating faster than incremental change.

stakeholderVoices.name: Procurement Director
stakeholderVoices.quote: Suppliers remain engaged but want clarity on our future model.

stakeholderVoices.name: Investor Relations
stakeholderVoices.quote: The market wants a sharper narrative.

keyPoints: Terraform stands at a strategic inflection point
Next move defines disciplined niche vs platform vs innovation challenger

decisionOptions.title: OPTION 1 — Innovation-Oriented Transformation
implications: Significant investment in AI, robotics R&D, and analytics
Longer payback horizons and execution risk
Potential for strong differentiation if successful
High upside with high demand on leadership

decisionOptions.title: OPTION 2 — Ecosystem-Oriented Integration
implications: Deep partnerships with suppliers and AI vendors

decisionOptions.title: OPTION 3 — Efficiency-Driven Consolidation
implications: Tight cost controls and selective automation

constraints: Board wants clearer direction, not multiple strategies
Suppliers want clarity on future model
Competitors accelerating faster than incremental change
